title: Clean and Standardize Raw Infosiga Data — clean_infosiga
text: cleaned processed tibble standardized columns types.

title: Clean and Standardize Raw Infosiga Data — clean_infosiga
text: function performs series data cleaning tasks, including: Standardizing categorical variables: Recodes text values consistent format (e.g., "SINISTRO FATAL" "Sinistro fatal"). Type conversion: Converts columns appropriate types, dates (lubridate::dmy), numbers, factors ordered levels (e.g., age groups). Handling missing values: Replaces "NAO DISPONIVEL" strings NA. Joining external data: Merges data internal municipalities dataset (municipios) add geographical information like IBGE codes administrative regions. Column renaming selection: Renames columns clarity (e.g., ano_fab ano_fabricacao) selects final set relevant variables, dropping intermediate raw ones. specific cleaning pipeline applied depends file_type argument.

title: Clean and Standardize Raw Infosiga Data — clean_infosiga
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # First, download and load the data data_dir <- tempdir() download_infosiga(destpath = data_dir) raw_sinistros_df <- load_infosiga(file_type = "sinistros", path = data_dir)  # Clean the 'sinistros' data cleaned_sinistros_df <- clean_infosiga(raw_sinistros_df, file_type = "sinistros")  # Clean the 'pessoas' data raw_pessoas_df <- load_infosiga(file_type = "pessoas", path = data_dir) cleaned_pessoas_df <- clean_infosiga(raw_pessoas_df, file_type = "pessoas") } # }
